content: keep knitting i placed two purl rounds for easy landmarks to pick up and knit later and why should we stress out about cutting our socks apart let s bind them off first then cut that way all the stitches will be secured and finished and the only thing left to do will be to separate them and sew in the ends photos by jessica stockbrugger and amanda schwabe *** june 22 2025 a note about fit and the heel i don t recommend knitting this particular configuration in stockinette stitch the eye of partridge slipped stitch pattern pulls the fabric in in a way that makes them fit well in combination with the number of short row here but when the fabric gauge of the heel is changed dramatically by switching to the much-looser stockinette stitch the heel will become huge and have pointy bits at the base and top i m testing and writing a stockinette version for this reason *** here s a video i made explaining the heel structure a bit more and how to work the double stitches ds https //youtu be/pgmloyu-ik4 here s a playlist of all my youtube videos about this pattern palindrome socks pattern tutorials https //www youtube com/playlist list=plsmd87wlkkn6mavwrdahv6tqmucnqcgvt
